channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Single mattress dumped in pitville park, 12th July
item.description:
Located by path near swan lake and park run path as you up hill with leisure centre on left. Found at 18:11. Not sure how long it’s been there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tommy Taylors Lane, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking across Framlington Court entrance, 12th July
item.description:
Beetle registration V456OOH parked six feet back on the double yellow lines that protect the entrance to Framlington Court (10 homes). This car was not ticketed yesterday and has not moved and is therefore parking across the entrance again today.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Libertus Road, Rowanfield, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped laminate flooring, 12th July
item.description:
Old laminate flooring left outside property on pavement. This has then be strewn across communal green space and dumped at corner of St.Pauls Walk/Hudson Street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, St Paul's Walk, St Paul’s, Cheltenham

item.title: Collapsing road, 11th July
item.description:
A large area of this road has fallen apart. I think because of a constant slow water leak which has been going on for some time. The road is in an extremely bad state.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Glass in road, 9th July
item.description:
